name: Wonference
tag_list: organization, conference, congress, seminar, education, elearning, platform, sas, virtual, online, discussion, agenda, international, networking, payments, registration
overview:
Wonference is the online platform for comprehensive management and organization of conferences. Facilitating all parts of the process, from creating the conference program, notification to the participants, managing communications and simplifying bureaucracy and the full payment and registration process.

The Wonference 10 key points:

Everything is in the cloud, do not install anything Focused on the needs of the organizer Interface simple and intuitive multilingual The whole organizational process in one integrated environment Maximizing participants’ socialization Call for papers and review complete module Easy management of workshops and parallel events Simplifying the process of registration and payment Online environment for discussion and networking Help, support and direct contact by Wonference assistants
